Package com.nilhcem.fakesmtp.gui.info

Provides all the GUI components from the main panel, which are not inside the tabbed pane component.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClearAllButton
    Button to clear all the information from the main panel.
    NbReceivedLabel
    Label class to display the number of received emails.
    PortTextField
    Text field in which will be written the desired SMTP port.
    SaveMsgField
    Text field in which will be written the path where emails will be automatically saved.
    StartServerButton
    Button to start the SMTP server.

Package com.nilhcem.fakesmtp.gui.info Description

Provides all the GUI components from the main panel, which are not inside the tabbed pane component.

It includes all the GUI components above the tabbed pane component, and the "clear all" button.
